attributes.action: Legislate for level of customer service for business and government departments to be fit for purpose.
attributes.additional_details: This site is a prime example of what I am fighting against, when a member of the public wishes to deal with an organisation they must make a series of choices as to where there problem is. Surely as a lay man I am not familiar with the workings of large organisations and government departments and need clear guidance to where the complaint or request needs to be addressed, not a vague and ambiguous set of menus that really do not contain the information that I need to make an informed choice. I am given the job of sorting through layers of jobs that I must do before I can proceed. The petition speaks for itself!

rejection.details: You say this petition speaks for itself but I'm afraid it doesn't. In order for it to get on to the site we need a clear call for the Government to do something.
